meanings.definition: Very poor or bad in quality
meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was the lousiest film I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: This sandwich is the lousiest one I've ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat refused to eat the lousiest fish I cooked.
meanings.sent4: The lousiest weather ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: The lousiest part of the day was when my ice cream fell on the ground.

meanings.sent1: The lousiest smell came from the garbage bin behind the house.
meanings.sent2: The lousiest taste lingered in my mouth long after I ate the food.
meanings.sent3: The lousiest sound woke me up in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent4: The lousiest feeling was waiting in the never-ending line.
meanings.sent5: The lousiest sight was the messy room after the party.
